Achievements

Publication

Accomplishments

  • Basic Thai Training Program, 2018
    —This program was organized by HRH scholarship program to help students who got scholarship to be able to use Thai in their study as well as their daily lives.
  • Awarded Royal Scholarship under Her Royal Highness Princess Maha Chakri Sirindhorn Education Project to the Kingdom of Cambodia, 2018
    —After applying for the scholarship and doing the examinations, I was awarded the scholarship to pursue Master degree in Computer Science at Mahidol University string from 2018
  • A winner of Samsung A Idol 2017 photography competition
    —The competition was organized by Samsung Cambodia and Cambodia Smartphone Photography Club in order to find 20 best smartphone photographers under the topic "Beautiful City"
